channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Communal lights out CUSTANCE HOUSE, 22nd October
item.description:
Lights need replacing outside flats 4, 12, 15 and 16 Custance House
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Provost Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road behind the car wash, 22nd October
item.description:
Missing double yellow lines. Extremely narrow single lane road where cars are constantly parking and creating problems for vehicles behind and pedestrians walking by as they cover the pavement too. Should be limited to loading/unloading during business hours.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 139, St Pancras Way, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A group of boys aged between 13-14 were slingshotting birds mainly parakeets and were extremely cocky and said thahe had killed another 6 somewhere else, 22nd October
item.description:
There was 6 of them all a similar age some of them using a slingshot and stone to kill the birds
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Lane, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Paint spillage at 10 Thornton Street SW9 6AG. The paint is on double yellow lines and the paint follows up the road due to tyre treads., 22nd October
item.description:
I like to report to report paint spillage at 10 Thornton Street SW9 6AG. The paint has left white tyre tracks up the road. The paint has recently been there. Please can the paint spill and the paint tracks be gently removed. Whatever can be done would be greatly appreciated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 290, Brixton Road, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recurring flytipping from Stephen House, 1B Darnley Road, 22nd October
item.description:
Neighbours on Darnley Road have been reporting this issue for months - fines need to be issued and the problem resolved. Ongoing flytipping of commercial waste on Darnley Road near Mare Street from Stephen House, 1B and C Darnley Road commercial units.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and bed frame, 22nd October
item.description:
X2 mattress left on street and bed frame left ok side of street. Moved out of the way and near the bins. Please clean away, been there for 2 weeks now and was obstructing path- so taken in and out neatly beside the big communal bins
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Monteagle Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Illegal cones outside Pira√±a, St James's, 22nd October
item.description:
Members of the restaurant's security team have set up cones, along the single yellow lines, outside their premises. It occurs almost every night and has been reported multiple times.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St. James's Street, Mayfair, London

item.title: Litter in curbs all around this area including slip road from dual carriageway, 22nd October
item.description:
This area is not litter picked are they on a programme of maintenance? The litter is from both slip roads on the dual carriageway into west street also the bushes on all verges are not tended are they on a maintenance programme. Perhaps the bushes/shrubs should be removed so vehicle have a better view, and the verge needs non maintenance material installed so there is no need for maintaining the verges and save the council money.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bronze Age Way, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over grown tree branches along bus route, 22nd October
item.description:
Over grown tree branches along 188 bus route at Canada Water. Some branches touch bus window.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Surrey Quays Road, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Lamp switched on continuously during daytime hours., 22nd October
item.description:
Halfway up Kimberley Avenue street lamp No.25 located by tall tree is switched on continuously during daytime hours. This lamp is vey close to another street lamp in Machell Street I have also reported that burns all day and night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Machell Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Someone keeps leaving rubbish, 22nd October
item.description:
Someone keeps leaving rubbish in front of my house on the pavement every few days. Most of the time is furniture. This time is a small cupboard and a microwave üòë

item.title: Turn off water fountain for the winter, 22nd October
item.description:
Can you kindly turn the water fountain off now given the cold weather? We witnessed a number of unsuspecting children getting wet while playing in the playground.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gomm Road, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Raised bed being used as a bin, 22nd October
item.description:
Raised bed at this path is being used as a dustbin. Rats were crawling out of it today when I visited my friend. It is not the first time I have witnessed the filth that my friend has to deal with. This is not being helped when staff are not even picking the rubbish up and today was the same 3 men and a woman from the cleaning team seen walking along the path and not picking up a single bit of litter. Not looking just walking doing nothing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Dunton Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
